description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by 2022-12-12 at 2 p.m. EST. All bids submitted after 2 p.m. EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
tags: Contracting Agency: Public Works and Government Services Canada
